SourceString: <me_FireDam>Fire</> <b>{data.ProjCount}|floor()</> ice shards in a cone dealing <b>{data.MinDmg}|floor() - {data.MaxDmg}|floor()</> <me_ColdDam>Cold Damage</> each. Additional hits against the same enemy deal <b>80%</> less Damage.\nOn use gain <me_Overwhelm>Overwhelm</> while you have an <me_Overwhelm>Overwhelm</> skill equipped.
<b>+{ProjPenMod}</> <me_Penetration>Projectile Penetration</>.\r\n<b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> less Damage after the first hit.

SourceString: When you hit a <me_Freeze>Frozen</> target, it causes an explosion dealing <b>{Damage}|round()</> <me_ColdDam>Cold Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius.
Projectiles are fired in random directions and spiral outwards.\r\n<b>{ProjAmountMod_UI}|round()%</> more Projectiles.\r\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.
Projectiles are fired in random directions and spiral outwards.
Homing projectiles without targets return to circle you.\n<b>{ProjRangeMod_UI}|round()%</> more Projectile Range.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.
Homing projectiles without targets return to circle you.\n<b>{ProjRangeMod_UI}|round()%</> more Projectile Range.
Deals additional <me_ColdDam>Cold Damage</> equal to <b>{InfusedDmg}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> <me_Reserve>reserved</> Energy.
Deals up to <b>{DmgMod_UI}%</> more Damage depending on distance. Reaches maximum Damage at <b>{DistMod}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</>.

Deal <b>{data.Damage}|round()</> <me_ColdDam>Cold Damage</> in a <b>{data.Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius around you.\n<b>{data.FreezeChance_UI}|round()%</> chance to <me_Freeze>Freeze</> for <b>{data.FreezeDuration}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)s</>.
Always <me_Freeze>Freezes</>. <b>+{FreezeDurationMod}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> Base <me_Freeze>Freeze</> Duration, <b>+{BaseCDMod}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> Base Cooldown Duration.\n

A second ice nova appears at your target location.
<b>{FreezeDurationMod_UI}|round()%</> reduced Base <me_Freeze>Freeze</> Duration.
<b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> less Damage and <me_AilmentChance>Ailment chance</>.
<b>+{BaseCDMod}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> Base Cooldown Duration.
A second ice nova appears at your target location.

Deals <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage to <me_Channel>channeling</> enemies and recovers <b>{CDRefresh_UI}%</> Cooldown if at least one <me_Channel>channeling</> enemy was hit.

Turns into a <b>{Angle}</> degree cone.
<b>+{RadiusMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius.
<b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage.
<b>+{FreezeChanceMod_UI}|round()%</> added chance to <me_Freeze>Freeze</>.
Call down <me_LightningDam>lightning</> at target location dealing <b>{data.Damage}|round()</> <me_LightningDam>Lightning Damage</> in a <b>{data.Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius.
Repeats <b>{Reps}|round()</> times in <b>{Interval}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> intervals.\n<b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> less Damage.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.

When directly used, enemies in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius around target location have a <b>{Chance_UI}|round()%</> chance to be hit by <me_LightningStrike>Lightning Strike</>.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.

When directly used, enemies in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius around target location have a <b>{Chance_UI}|round()%</> chance to be hit by <me_LightningStrike>Lightning Strike</>.
Gain <b>{RageGain}|round()</> <me_Rage>Rage</> on the first hit.\nDeals <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage per <me_Rage>Rage</>.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.
Gain <b>{RageGain}|round()</> <me_Rage>Rage</> on the first hit.\nDeals <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage per <me_Rage>Rage</>.

On use gain <b>{OverloadGain}|round()</> <me_Overload>Overload</>.\n<b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage and <b>{CSMod_UI}|round()%</> more Cast Speed.\n<b>{MPCostMod_UI}|round()%</> less Energy Cost.

Deals <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_EnergyDam>Energy Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius and enemies hit lose <b>{MPRemoval}|round()</> Energy.\r\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.
Deals <b>{Dmg}|round()</> Energy Drain Damage in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius and enemies hit lose <b>{MPRemoval}|round()</> Energy.

Throw a bolt of <me_LightningDam>lightning</> that deals <b>{data.Damage}|round()</> <me_LightningDam>Lightning Damage</>.
Infinite <me_Penetration>Projectile Penetration</>.

On first hit applies a debuff for <b>3s</>. No stack limit. No Duration refresh. When it expires the target takes <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_LightningDam>Lightning Damage</> per stack.\n<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost.
On first hit applies a debuff for <b>3s</>. No stack limit. No Duration refresh. When it expires the target takes <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_LightningDam>Lightning Damage</> per stack.

Creates a Cyclone that deals <b>{data.DamagePerTick}</> <me_ColdDam>Cold Damage</> at target location in a <b>{data.Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)m</> radius for <b>{data.Duration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>.
Consumes <b>{data.UpkeepCost}|round()</> Energy per second while active.

Deals <b>5%</> more Damage per <me_Amplify>Amplify</>.
Cyclone gains <me_Amplify>Amplify</> whenever you use a <me_FireDam>Fire</>, <me_ColdDam>Cold</> or <me_LightningDam>Lightning</> skill (max <b>10</> stacks).
When Cyclone ends or is recast it loses all <me_Amplify>Amplify</> stacks.

Turns the Cyclone into a Blizzard.
<b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage.
<b>+{AilmentMod_UI}|round()%</> added Base <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</>.
Adds chance to <me_Freeze>Freeze</> for <b>0.8s</>. 
Chance is <b>{FreezeChance_UI}|round()% + 0.5%</> per <me_Chill>Chill</> stack on target (up to <b>15%</>).
<b>{FreezeChance_UI}|round()% + 0.5%</> per <me_Chill>Chill</> stack on target chance (up to <b>15%</>) to <me_Freeze>Freeze</> for <b>0.8s</>.

Every <b>2</> seconds enemies inside the Thunderstorm have a <b>{Chance_UI}|round()%</> chance to be hit by a <me_LightningStrike>Lightning Strike</>. \r\n<b>+10%</> increased frequency per <me_Amplify>Amplify</>.
An additional smaller Cyclone with <b>3.5m</> radius persists around you.\n<b>+2</> Energy Degeneration

Instead you can create up to <b>3</> smaller storms with a <b>3.5m</> radius.
<b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage.
<b>{DurationMod}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> Duration.
<b>+{MPCostMod}|round()</> Energy Cost. No Energy Degeneration.
Placing a new localized storm instead only clears <b>30%</> <me_Amplify>Amplify</> stacks.
Create up to <b>3</> smaller storms.\nNo Energy Degeneration.\nPlacing a new localized storm instead only clears <b>30%</> <me_Amplify>Amplify</> stacks.

Gains <b>{AmplifyGain}|round()</> <me_Amplify>Amplify</> every <b>2s</> while a cyclone is present.\nWhile inside a cyclone gain <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> increased <me_Physical>Physical</>, <me_ColdDam>Cold</> and <me_LightningDam>Lightning Damage</> per <me_Amplify>Amplify</>.
When a cyclone naturally ends it deals <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_ColdDam>Cold Damage</> inside its radius. This deals <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> more Damage per <me_Amplify>Amplify</>.
Allies inside a Cyclone are granted 15/30/45% increased Projectile Damage.

Emit an <me_Aura>Aura</> with a <b>18m</> radius.\nAura grants you and allies <b>{data.ColdDmgIncrease_UI}|round()%</> increased <me_ColdDam>Cold Damage</>.\nAura grants you and allies <b>{data.LightDmgIncrease_UI}|round()%</> increased <me_LightningDam>Lightning Damage</>.

<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>+{ResMod_UI}|round()%</> <me_ColdDam>Cold</> <me_Resistance>Resistance</> and <b>+{MaxResMod_UI}|round()%</> Max <me_ColdDam>Cold</> <me_Resistance>Resistance</>.\n<b>+{ReservedMPMod}|round()</> Energy <me_Reserve>reserved</>.

<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>+{ResMod_UI}|round()%</> <me_LightningDam>Lightning</> <me_Resistance>Resistance</> and <b>+{MaxResMod_UI}|round()%</> Max <me_LightningDam>Lightning</> <me_Resistance>Resistance</>.\n<b>+{ReservedMPMod}|round()</> Energy <me_Reserve>reserved</>.

<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>+{ResMod_UI}|round()%</> <me_LightningDam>Lightning</> <me_Resistance>Resistance</> and <b>+{MaxResMod_UI}|round()%</> Max <me_LightningDam>Lightning</> <me_Resistance>Resistance</>.

<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>+{DmgMod}|round()</> <me_ColdDam>Cold</> Weapon Damage.\nGrants you <b>100%</> Weapon Damage converted to <me_ColdDam>Cold Damage</>.\n<b>+{ReservedMPMod}|round()</> Energy <me_Reserve>reserved</>.
<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>+{DmgMod}|round()</> <me_ColdDam>Cold</> Weapon Damage.\nGrants you <b>100%</> Weapon Damage converted to <me_ColdDam>Cold Damage</>.

<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>+{DmgMod}|round()</> <me_LightningDam>Lightning</> Weapon Damage.\nGrants you <b>100%</> Weapon Damage converted to <me_LightningDam>Lightning Damage</>.\n<b>+{ReservedMPMod}|round()</> Energy <me_Reserve>reserved</>.
<me_Aura>Aura</> grants you and allies <b>+{DmgMod}|round()</> <me_LightningDam>Lightning</> Weapon Damage.\nGrants you <b>100%</> Weapon Damage converted to <me_LightningDam>Lightning Damage</>.

Grants you <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> increased <me_LightningStrike>Lightning Strike</> Damage.\nEvery <b>2s</> you have a <b>{Chance_UI}|round()%</> chance to hit a random enemy within the <me_Aura>aura</> with a <me_LightningStrike>Lightning Strike</>.\n<b>+{ReservedMPMod}|round()</> Energy <me_Reserve>reserved</>.

Grants you <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> increased <me_LightningStrike>Lightning Strike</> Damage.\nEvery <b>2s</> you have a <b>{Chance_UI}|round()%</> chance to hit a random enemy within the <me_Aura>aura</> with a <me_LightningStrike>Lightning Strike</>.

When an enemy hits you within a <b>3m</> range, deal <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_ColdDam>Cold Damage</> to it with <b>{AilmentChance_UI}|round()%</> <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</> and <b>{FreezeChance_UI}|round()%</> chance to <me_Freeze>Freeze</> for <b>{FreezeDuration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>.\n<b>+{ReservedMPMod}|round()</> Energy <me_Reserve>reserved</>.

When an enemy hits you within a <b>3m</> range, deal <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_ColdDam>Cold Damage</> to it with <b>{AilmentChance_UI}|round()%</> <me_AilmentChance>Ailment Chance</> and <b>{FreezeChance_UI}|round()%</> chance to <me_Freeze>Freeze</> for <b>{FreezeDuration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>.

<me_Aura>Aura</> grants an additional <b>{DmgMod_UI}|round()%</> increased <me_ColdDam>Cold</> and <me_LightningDam>Lightning Damage</>.\n<b>+{ReservedMPMod}|round()</> Energy <me_Reserve>reserved</>.
Instantly teleport to target location.\nWhile this ability is on cooldown, you can reactivate it once to teleport back to the start location.
Instead briefly disappear into the sky and crash down on the target location dealing <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius
Enemies in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius around the target location have a <b>{Chance_UI}|round()%</> chance to be hit by <me_LightningStrike>Lightning Strikes</>
For <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> you can reuse the ability <b>{Repetition}|floor()</> times.\nThe cooldown starts afterwards.
Thundercrash has a <b>{Chance_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> chance to <me_Stun>Stun</> for <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>
Thundercrash has a <b>{Chance_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> chance to <me_Stun>Stun</> for <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>

Cause Frozen Ground at target location for <b>{dataBase.FrozenGroundDuration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> and curse enemies with Frostbite for <b>{dataActive.DurationTotal}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> in a <b>{dataDmg.Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius.
Frozen Ground <me_Slow>slows</> enemies by <b>{dataBase.FrozenGroundSlow_UI}|round()%</>
Cursed enemies take <b>{dataDmg.ColdDmgTotal}|round()</> <me_ColdDam>Cold Damage</> every <b>{dataBase.Period}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>. 
This Damage increases on Frozen Ground by up to <b>{dataBase.DmgModLimit_UI}|round()%</> after <b>{dataBase.FrozenGroundDuration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>. 
When the limit is reached a <me_ColdDam>cold</> explosion deals <b>{dataDmgAlt2.ColdDmgTotal}|round()</> <me_ColdDam>Cold Damage</> in a <b>{dataDmgAlt2.Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius.
Consumes <me_Freeze>Freeze</> on <me_Freeze>Frozen</> enemies to cause an explosion that deals <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_ColdDam>Cold Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius
<b>{AreaMod_UI}|round()%</> more Area Size of Frozen Ground and Curse application.
You have <b>{CCDurationMod_UI}%</> increased <me_Freeze>Freeze</> and <me_Stun>Stun</> Duration against affected enemies.
When the debuffed enemy gets <me_Freeze>Frozen</>, deals <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_ColdDam>Cold Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius around them.

Active:
Gain <b>{dataBase.MSBonus_UI}|round()%</> increased Movement Speed, <b>{dataBase.DmgBonus_UI}|round()%</> increased Total Damage for <b>{dataActive.DurationTotal}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>.

Passive:
When you hit enemies with other skills, Tempest gains <me_Amplify>Amplify</>.
Maximum <me_Amplify>Amplify</> <b>{dataActive.AmplifyTotal}|round()</>.

When used with at least <b>30</> <me_Amplify>Amplify</>, consumes it to hit up to <b>{dataDmg.TargetLimitTotal}|round()</> enemies in a <b>{dataDmg.Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius dealing <b>{dataDmg.LightMinDmgTotal}|round() - {dataDmg.LightMaxDmgTotal}|round()</> <me_LightningDam>Lightning Damage</>.
Deals <b>5%</> more Damage per <me_Amplify>Amplify</> consumed.

With at least <b>{Amplify}|round()</> <me_Amplify>Amplify</>, deals <b>{Dmg}|round()</> <me_LightningDam>Lightning Damage</> to the closest enemy in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius every <b>{Period}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>\nThis deals <b>{DmgMod_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> more Damage per <me_Amplify>Amplify</>
